name: SurveySays
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: survey says
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Survey Says is an exciting trivia game where players try to guess the top answers to fun survey questions.

HOW TO PLAY:

Players can play 3 rounds each day. During each round, the player tries to guess as many of the top answers to the question as they can before getting 3 wrong answers (or strikes). If they get 3 strikes, the round is over.

Points are awarded based on the number of survey responses we received for each top answer.

If the player guesses all of the top survey answers before getting 3 strikes, they get 50 bonus points.

If you need more time to think, just say "more time". You can only get more time once per round.

COMPETE WITH OTHERS:

Everyone gets the same questions each day. The skill will tell you how well you performed versus other players that day.

Gain more points to move up the leaderboard to earn fun rewards (coming soon).

Play every day to keep your Play Streak alive. See if you can get the highest play streak among your friends!

PREMIUM FEATURES:

Premium Members get to play 3 additional rounds of Survey Says each day.

BE PART OF THE GAME:

After you play each day, you'll have the opportunity to be a part of the game and answer survey questions that will be used in future rounds of play. You'll also earn 5 additional points for each question you answer. We appreciate your help!

FEEDBACK/SUPPORT:

We hope you'll love Survey Says and will help us out by giving the skill a review. You can give a review from your Alexa app on your phone OR on Amazon.com. Just search for our skill in the skill section and click on "Write a Customer Review".

If there's anything we can do to make Survey Says even better, we want to know! Please e-mail us at surveysays@voiceapps.com. We value your feedback!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
